frontmatter.title: Race conditions in GO
frontmatter.description: When two Goroutines share the same resources and try to read/write that resource at the same time then there might be non deterministic output for the program and this situation is said to be Race condition.  .

frontmatter.title: Anatomy of class in ES6
frontmatter.description: ES6 Classes formalize the common JavaScript pattern of simulating class-like inheritance hierarchies using functions and prototypes. They are effectively simple sugaring over prototype-based OO, offering a convenient declarative form for class patterns which encourage interoperability.
